Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class ISO_IEC_9796_2_SCHEME_1

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.SigScheme
uk.msci.project.rsa.ISO_IEC_9796_2_SCHEME_1
All Implemented Interfaces:
SigSchemeInterface
public class ISO_IEC_9796_2_SCHEME_1 extends SigScheme
This class implements the ISO/IEC 9796-2 Scheme 1 signature scheme using RSA keys. It provides functionalities for signing and verifying messages with RSA digital signatures, conforming to the ISO/IEC 9796-2:2010 specification and chooses the appropriate mode of message recovery according to the length of message provided to its sign algorithm.

  • Method Details

    • encodeMessage

      public byte[] encodeMessage(byte[] M) throws DataFormatException
      Encodes a message following the ISO/IEC 9796-2:2010 standard, which includes hashing the message and preparing the encoded message with specified padding. The format of the encoded message is: Partial Recovery: 0x6A ∥ m1 ∥ hash ∥ 0xBC. Full Recovery: 0x4B...BA ∥ m ∥ hash ∥ 0xBC.

      Java equivalent format requires the encoding to be a byte less than the modulus byte size to ensure resulting value is less than modulus.

      Specified by:
      encodeMessage in class SigScheme
      Parameters:
      M - The message to be encoded.
      Returns:
      The encoded message as a byte array.
      Throws:
      DataFormatException - if the signature format is not valid.

    • sign

      public byte[] sign(byte[] M) throws DataFormatException
      Creates a signature for specified message and stores the extracted non-recoverable part of the message by initialising its corresponding field in the class
      Specified by:
      sign in interface SigSchemeInterface
      Overrides:
      sign in class SigScheme
      Parameters:
      M - The message to be signed.
      Returns:
      A combined byte array containing signature and an appended non-recoverable part of the message.
      Throws:
      DataFormatException - If the message encoding fails.

    • verifyMessage

      public boolean verifyMessage(byte[] m2, byte[] S) throws DataFormatException
      Verifies an RSA signature according to the ISO/IEC 9796-2 Scheme 1 standard. Validates the encoded message structure, allows for implicit message recovery by automatically choosing the mode of recovery based on the length of provided message.
      Overrides:
      verifyMessage in class SigScheme
      Parameters:
      m2 - The non-recoverable part of the message (m2).
      S - The signature to be verified.
      Returns:
      A SignatureRecovery object containing the result of the verification and any recovered message.
      Throws:
      DataFormatException - if the signature format is not valid.

    • addM2

      public void addM2(byte[] m2)
      Processes and adds the non-recoverable part of the message (m2) to the message digest. This is part of the message that is not covered by the signature.
      Parameters:
      m2 - The non-recoverable part of the message (m2).
